Please! Do you expect us to believe that BS? It was just a quick and easy way 
to get out of the RPG. And pills? PILLS? Yeah, right. Im sure thats what did 
it. I dont believe it for a minute. 
-jp

--part1_71.a700977.27ab6fd3_boundary
